verses.text: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
verses.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me

verses.text: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised

verses.text: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.translation: By the mount

verses.text: وَكِتَٰبٖ مَّسۡطُورٖ
verses.translation: And [by] a Book inscribed

verses.text: فِي رَقّٖ مَّنشُورٖ
verses.translation: In parchment spread open

verses.text: وَٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡمُورِ
verses.translation: And [by] the frequented House

verses.text: وَٱلسَّقۡفِ ٱلۡمَرۡفُوعِ
verses.translation: And [by] the heaven raised high

verses.text: وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ ٱلۡمَسۡجُورِ
verses.translation: And [by] the sea filled [with fire]

verses.text: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur

verses.text: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٖ
verses.translation: Of it there is no preventer

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوۡرٗا
verses.translation: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

verses.text: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ سَيۡرٗا
verses.translation: And the mountains will pass on, departing

verses.text: فَوَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي خَوۡضٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ
verses.translation: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say]

verses.text: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: This is the Fire which you used to deny

verses.text: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Then is this magic, or do you not see

verses.text: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا فَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْ أَوۡ لَا تَصۡبِرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَنَعِيمٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure

verses.text: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

verses.text: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
verses.translation: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلۡحَقۡنَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَمَآ أَلَتۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيِٕۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٞ
verses.translation: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained

verses.text: وَأَمۡدَدۡنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٖ وَلَحۡمٖ مِّمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire

verses.text: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ
verses.translation: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin

verses.text: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ
verses.translation: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected

verses.text: وَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other

verses.text: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah]

verses.text: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.translation: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire

verses.text: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful

verses.text: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ
verses.translation: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman

verses.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time

verses.text: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters

verses.text: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people

verses.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe

verses.text: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful

verses.text: أَمۡ خُلِقُواْ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَيۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ
verses.translation: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]

verses.text: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain

verses.text: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]

verses.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ سُلَّمٞ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ فِيهِۖ فَلۡيَأۡتِ مُسۡتَمِعُهُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority

verses.text: أَمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡبَنَٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Or has He daughters while you have sons

verses.text: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down

verses.text: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down

verses.text: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan

verses.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

verses.text: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
verses.translation: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up

verses.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible

verses.text: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know

verses.text: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِدۡبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars

verses.text: وَٱلنَّجۡمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
verses.translation: By the star when it descends

verses.text: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمۡ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
verses.translation: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred

verses.text: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination

verses.text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحۡيٞ يُوحَىٰ
verses.translation: It is not but a revelation revealed

verses.text: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡقُوَىٰ
verses.translation: Taught to him by one intense in strength

verses.text: ذُو مِرَّةٖ فَٱسۡتَوَىٰ
verses.translation: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

verses.text: وَهُوَ بِٱلۡأُفُقِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
verses.translation: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon

verses.text: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he approached and descended

verses.text: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوۡسَيۡنِ أَوۡ أَدۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer

verses.text: فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ مَآ أَوۡحَىٰ
verses.translation: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed

verses.text: مَا كَذَبَ ٱلۡفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰٓ
verses.translation: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw

verses.text: أَفَتُمَٰرُونَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: So will you dispute with him over what he saw

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ رَءَاهُ نَزۡلَةً أُخۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: And he certainly saw him in another descent

verses.text: عِندَ سِدۡرَةِ ٱلۡمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary

verses.text: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Near it is the Garden of Refuge

verses.text: إِذۡ يَغۡشَى ٱلسِّدۡرَةَ مَا يَغۡشَىٰ
verses.translation: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it]

verses.text: مَا زَاغَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit]

verses.text: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتُمُ ٱللَّـٰتَ وَٱلۡعُزَّىٰ
verses.translation: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza

verses.text: وَمَنَوٰةَ ٱلثَّالِثَةَ ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And Manat, the third - the other one

verses.text: أَلَكُمُ ٱلذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Is the male for you and for Him the female

verses.text: تِلۡكَ إِذٗا قِسۡمَةٞ ضِيزَىٰٓ
verses.translation: That, then, is an unjust division

verses.text: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّآ أَسۡمَآءٞ سَمَّيۡتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلۡطَٰنٍۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهۡوَى ٱلۡأَنفُسُۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ
verses.translation: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance

verses.text: أَمۡ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
verses.translation: Or is there for man whatever he wishes

verses.text: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life]

verses.text: ۞وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغۡنِي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن يَأۡذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡضَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ تَسۡمِيَةَ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names

verses.text: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـٔٗا
verses.translation: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all

verses.text: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَلَمۡ يُرِدۡ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
verses.translation: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life

verses.text: ذَٰلِكَ مَبۡلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
verses.translation: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided

verses.text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَـٰٓـُٔواْ بِمَا عَمِلُواْ وَيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَى
verses.translation: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward]

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِۚ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِكُمۡ إِذۡ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِذۡ أَنتُمۡ أَجِنَّةٞ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡۖ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Have you seen the one who turned away

verses.text: وَأَعۡطَىٰ قَلِيلٗا وَأَكۡدَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And gave a little and [then] refrained

verses.text: أَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees

verses.text: أَمۡ لَمۡ يُنَبَّأۡ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

verses.text: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلَّذِي وَفَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations]

verses.text: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

verses.text: وَأَن لَّيۡسَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

verses.text: وَأَنَّ سَعۡيَهُۥ سَوۡفَ يُرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that his effort is going to be seen

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُجۡزَىٰهُ ٱلۡجَزَآءَ ٱلۡأَوۡفَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

verses.text: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: And that to your Lord is the finality

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَضۡحَكَ وَأَبۡكَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحۡيَا
verses.translation: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ خَلَقَ ٱلزَّوۡجَيۡنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female

verses.text: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ إِذَا تُمۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

verses.text: وَأَنَّ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَغۡنَىٰ وَأَقۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلشِّعۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

verses.text: وَأَنَّهُۥٓ أَهۡلَكَ عَادًا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

verses.text: وَثَمُودَاْ فَمَآ أَبۡقَىٰ
verses.translation: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them]

verses.text: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ
verses.translation: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing

verses.text: وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَةَ أَهۡوَىٰ
verses.translation: And the overturned towns He hurled down

verses.text: فَغَشَّىٰهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
verses.translation: And covered them by that which He covered

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
verses.translation: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt

verses.text: هَٰذَا نَذِيرٞ مِّنَ ٱلنُّذُرِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰٓ
verses.translation: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners

verses.text: أَزِفَتِ ٱلۡأٓزِفَةُ
verses.translation: The Approaching Day has approached

verses.text: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
verses.translation: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover

verses.text: أَفَمِنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ تَعۡجَبُونَ
verses.translation: Then at this statement do you wonder

verses.text: وَتَضۡحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبۡكُونَ
verses.translation: And you laugh and do not weep

verses.text: وَأَنتُمۡ سَٰمِدُونَ
verses.translation: While you are proudly sporting

verses.text: فَٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِۤ وَٱعۡبُدُواْ۩
verses.translation: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him]

verses.text: ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two]

verses.text: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ
verses.translation: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic

verses.text: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
verses.translation: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence

verses.text: حِكۡمَةُۢ بَٰلِغَةٞۖ فَمَا تُغۡنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them]

verses.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding

verses.text: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ
verses.translation: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading

verses.text: مُّهۡطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ يَقُولُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَسِرٞ
verses.translation: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day

verses.text: ۞كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ فَكَذَّبُواْ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُواْ مَجۡنُونٞ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ
verses.translation: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled

verses.text: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَغۡلُوبٞ فَٱنتَصِرۡ
verses.translation: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help

verses.text: فَفَتَحۡنَآ أَبۡوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٖ مُّنۡهَمِرٖ
verses.translation: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

verses.text: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined

verses.text: وَحَمَلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلۡوَٰحٖ وَدُسُرٖ
verses.translation: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails

verses.text: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied

verses.text: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember

verses.text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

verses.text: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِي يَوۡمِ نَحۡسٖ مُّسۡتَمِرّٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune

verses.text: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ
verses.translation: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted

verses.text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

verses.text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: Thamud denied the warning

verses.text: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness

verses.text: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ
verses.translation: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar

verses.text: سَيَعۡلَمُونَ غَدٗا مَّنِ ٱلۡكَذَّابُ ٱلۡأَشِرُ
verses.translation: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar

verses.text: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
verses.translation: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient

verses.text: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ
verses.translation: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn]

verses.text: فَنَادَوۡاْ صَاحِبَهُمۡ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her]

verses.text: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

verses.text: كَذَّبَتۡ قَوۡمُ لُوطِۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lot denied the warning

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٖۖ نَّجَّيۡنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

verses.text: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡاْ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَآ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ صَبَّحَهُم بُكۡرَةً عَذَابٞ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
verses.translation: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment

verses.text: فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: So taste My punishment and warning

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.translation: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning

verses.text: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability

verses.text: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture

verses.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ نَحۡنُ جَمِيعٞ مُّنتَصِرٞ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]

verses.text: سَيُهۡزَمُ ٱلۡجَمۡعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat]

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar

verses.text: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ بِقَدَرٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, all things We created with predestination

verses.text: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
verses.translation: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.translation: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember

verses.text: وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٖ فَعَلُوهُ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: And everything they did is in written records

verses.text: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٖ وَكَبِيرٖ مُّسۡتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَنَهَرٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers

verses.text: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ
verses.translation: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability

verses.text: ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ
verses.translation: The Most Merciful

verses.text: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ
verses.translation: Taught the Qur'an

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ
verses.translation: Created man

verses.text: عَلَّمَهُ ٱلۡبَيَانَ
verses.translation: [And] taught him eloquence

verses.text: ٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ بِحُسۡبَانٖ
verses.translation: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation

verses.text: وَٱلنَّجۡمُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ يَسۡجُدَانِ
verses.translation: And the stars and trees prostrate

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance

verses.text: أَلَّا تَطۡغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡمِيزَانِ
verses.translation: That you not transgress within the balance

verses.text: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance

verses.text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلۡأَنَامِ
verses.translation: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures

verses.text: فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَٱلنَّخۡلُ ذَاتُ ٱلۡأَكۡمَامِ
verses.translation: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]

verses.text: وَٱلۡحَبُّ ذُو ٱلۡعَصۡفِ وَٱلرَّيۡحَانُ
verses.translation: And grain having husks and scented plants

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ كَٱلۡفَخَّارِ
verses.translation: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery

verses.text: وَخَلَقَ ٱلۡجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٖ مِّن نَّارٖ
verses.translation: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقَيۡنِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡمَغۡرِبَيۡنِ
verses.translation: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: مَرَجَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ يَلۡتَقِيَانِ
verses.translation: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side]

verses.text: بَيۡنَهُمَا بَرۡزَخٞ لَّا يَبۡغِيَانِ
verses.translation: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهُمَا ٱللُّؤۡلُؤُ وَٱلۡمَرۡجَانُ
verses.translation: From both of them emerge pearl and coral

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ
verses.translation: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: كُلُّ مَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا فَانٖ
verses.translation: Everyone upon the earth will perish

verses.text: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
verses.translation: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ
verses.translation: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: سَنَفۡرُغُ لَكُمۡ أَيُّهَ ٱلثَّقَلَانِ
verses.translation: We will attend to you, O prominent beings

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: يَٰمَعۡشَرَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُمۡ أَن تَنفُذُواْ مِنۡ أَقۡطَارِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنفُذُواْۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ
verses.translation: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah]

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.translation: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ
verses.translation: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
verses.translation: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ
verses.translation: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
verses.translation: This is Hell, which the criminals deny

verses.text: يَطُوفُونَ بَيۡنَهَا وَبَيۡنَ حَمِيمٍ ءَانٖ
verses.translation: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree]

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: وَلِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: ذَوَاتَآ أَفۡنَانٖ
verses.translation: Having [spreading] branches

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: فِيهِمَا عَيۡنَانِ تَجۡرِيَانِ
verses.translation: In both of them are two springs, flowing

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٖ زَوۡجَانِ
verses.translation: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ
verses.translation: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
verses.translation: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُنَّ ٱلۡيَاقُوتُ وَٱلۡمَرۡجَانُ
verses.translation: As if they were rubies and coral

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: هَلۡ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡإِحۡسَٰنِ إِلَّا ٱلۡإِحۡسَٰنُ
verses.translation: Is the reward for good [anything] but good

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: مُدۡهَآمَّتَانِ
verses.translation: Dark green [in color]

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: فِيهِمَا عَيۡنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
verses.translation: In both of them are two springs, spouting

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: فِيهِمَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَنَخۡلٞ وَرُمَّانٞ
verses.translation: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: فِيهِنَّ خَيۡرَٰتٌ حِسَانٞ
verses.translation: In them are good and beautiful women

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: حُورٞ مَّقۡصُورَٰتٞ فِي ٱلۡخِيَامِ
verses.translation: Fair ones reserved in pavilions

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ
verses.translation: Untouched before them by man or jinni

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرٖ وَعَبۡقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٖ
verses.translation: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny

verses.text: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
verses.translation: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor

verses.text: إِذَا وَقَعَتِ ٱلۡوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: When the Occurrence occurs

verses.text: لَيۡسَ لِوَقۡعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
verses.translation: There is, at its occurrence, no denial

verses.text: خَافِضَةٞ رَّافِعَةٌ
verses.translation: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others]

verses.text: إِذَا رُجَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ رَجّٗا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken with convulsion

verses.text: وَبُسَّتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ بَسّٗا
verses.translation: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling

verses.text: فَكَانَتۡ هَبَآءٗ مُّنۢبَثّٗا
verses.translation: And become dust dispersing

verses.text: وَكُنتُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا ثَلَٰثَةٗ
verses.translation: And you become [of] three kinds

verses.text: فَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ مَآ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right

verses.text: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ مَآ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
verses.translation: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left

verses.text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ
verses.translation: And the forerunners, the forerunners

verses.text: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]

verses.text: فِي جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: In the Gardens of Pleasure

verses.text: ثُلَّةٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: A [large] company of the former peoples

verses.text: وَقَلِيلٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And a few of the later peoples

verses.text: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّوۡضُونَةٖ
verses.translation: On thrones woven [with ornament]

verses.text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَيۡهَا مُتَقَٰبِلِينَ
verses.translation: Reclining on them, facing each other

verses.text: يَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ
verses.translation: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal

verses.text: بِأَكۡوَابٖ وَأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأۡسٖ مِّن مَّعِينٖ
verses.translation: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring

verses.text: لَّا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنۡهَا وَلَا يُنزِفُونَ
verses.translation: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated

verses.text: وَفَٰكِهَةٖ مِّمَّا يَتَخَيَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And fruit of what they select

verses.text: وَلَحۡمِ طَيۡرٖ مِّمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire

verses.text: وَحُورٌ عِينٞ
verses.translation: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes

verses.text: كَأَمۡثَٰلِ ٱللُّؤۡلُوِٕ ٱلۡمَكۡنُونِ
verses.translation: The likenesses of pearls well-protected

verses.text: جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: As reward for what they used to do

verses.text: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا
verses.translation: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin

verses.text: إِلَّا قِيلٗا سَلَٰمٗا سَلَٰمٗا
verses.translation: Only a saying: "Peace, peace

verses.text: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡيَمِينِ مَآ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
verses.translation: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right

verses.text: فِي سِدۡرٖ مَّخۡضُودٖ
verses.translation: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed

verses.text: وَطَلۡحٖ مَّنضُودٖ
verses.translation: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]

verses.text: وَظِلّٖ مَّمۡدُودٖ
verses.translation: And shade extended

verses.text: وَمَآءٖ مَّسۡكُوبٖ
verses.translation: And water poured out

verses.text: وَفَٰكِهَةٖ كَثِيرَةٖ
verses.translation: And fruit, abundant [and varied]

verses.text: لَّا مَقۡطُوعَةٖ وَلَا مَمۡنُوعَةٖ
verses.translation: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden

verses.text: وَفُرُشٖ مَّرۡفُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: And [upon] beds raised high

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنشَأۡنَٰهُنَّ إِنشَآءٗ
verses.translation: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation

verses.text: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُنَّ أَبۡكَارًا
verses.translation: And made them virgins

verses.text: عُرُبًا أَتۡرَابٗا
verses.translation: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age

verses.text: لِّأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
verses.translation: For the companions of the right [who are]

verses.text: ثُلَّةٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: A company of the former peoples

verses.text: وَثُلَّةٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And a company of the later peoples

verses.text: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ مَآ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ
verses.translation: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left

verses.text: فِي سَمُومٖ وَحَمِيمٖ
verses.translation: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water

verses.text: وَظِلّٖ مِّن يَحۡمُومٖ
verses.translation: And a shade of black smoke

verses.text: لَّا بَارِدٖ وَلَا كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Neither cool nor beneficial

verses.text: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُتۡرَفِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence

verses.text: وَكَانُواْ يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى ٱلۡحِنثِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And they used to persist in the great violation

verses.text: وَكَانُواْ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected

verses.text: أَوَءَابَآؤُنَا ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: And our forefathers [as well]

verses.text: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ وَٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples

verses.text: لَمَجۡمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَٰتِ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
verses.translation: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers

verses.text: لَأٓكِلُونَ مِن شَجَرٖ مِّن زَقُّومٖ
verses.translation: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum

verses.text: فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ
verses.translation: And filling with it your bellies

verses.text: فَشَٰرِبُونَ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ
verses.translation: And drinking on top of it from scalding water

verses.text: فَشَٰرِبُونَ شُرۡبَ ٱلۡهِيمِ
verses.translation: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels

verses.text: هَٰذَا نُزُلُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense

verses.text: نَحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ فَلَوۡلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
verses.translation: We have created you, so why do you not believe

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تُمۡنُونَ
verses.translation: Have you seen that which you emit

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمۡ تَخۡلُقُونَهُۥٓ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator

verses.text: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ
verses.translation: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone

verses.text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِي مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتُم مَّا تَحۡرُثُونَ
verses.translation: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمۡ تَزۡرَعُونَهُۥٓ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلزَّـٰرِعُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower

verses.text: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ
verses.translation: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder

verses.text: إِنَّا لَمُغۡرَمُونَ
verses.translation: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt

verses.text: بَلۡ نَحۡنُ مَحۡرُومُونَ
verses.translation: Rather, we have been deprived

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَآءَ ٱلَّذِي تَشۡرَبُونَ
verses.translation: And have you seen the water that you drink

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down

verses.text: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ
verses.translation: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful

verses.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِي تُورُونَ
verses.translation: And have you seen the fire that you ignite

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ
verses.translation: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer

verses.text: نَحۡنُ جَعَلۡنَٰهَا تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَمَتَٰعٗا لِّلۡمُقۡوِينَ
verses.translation: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers

verses.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great

verses.text: ۞فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِمَوَٰقِعِ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.translation: Then I swear by the setting of the stars

verses.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَقَسَمٞ لَّوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقُرۡءَانٞ كَرِيمٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an

verses.text: فِي كِتَٰبٖ مَّكۡنُونٖ
verses.translation: In a Register well-protected

verses.text: لَّا يَمَسُّهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُطَهَّرُونَ
verses.translation: None touch it except the purified

verses.text: تَنزِيلٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds

verses.text: أَفَبِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ أَنتُم مُّدۡهِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent

verses.text: وَتَجۡعَلُونَ رِزۡقَكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]

verses.text: فَلَوۡلَآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلۡحُلۡقُومَ
verses.translation: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat

verses.text: وَأَنتُمۡ حِينَئِذٖ تَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: And you are at that time looking on

verses.text: وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن لَّا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see

verses.text: فَلَوۡلَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ غَيۡرَ مَدِينِينَ
verses.translation: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed

verses.text: تَرۡجِعُونَهَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
verses.translation: Bring it back, if you should be truthful

verses.text: فَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah

verses.text: فَرَوۡحٞ وَرَيۡحَانٞ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِيمٖ
verses.translation: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
verses.translation: And if he was of the companions of the right

verses.text: فَسَلَٰمٞ لَّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray

verses.text: فَنُزُلٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ
verses.translation: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water

verses.text: وَتَصۡلِيَةُ جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: And burning in Hellfire

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ ٱلۡيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is the true certainty

verses.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great

verses.text: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

verses.text: لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
verses.translation: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡأٓخِرُ وَٱلظَّـٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
verses.translation: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing

verses.text: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
verses.translation: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters

verses.text: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts

verses.text: ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسۡتَخۡلَفِينَ فِيهِۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَأَنفَقُواْ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ
verses.translation: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward

verses.text: وَمَا لَكُمۡ لَا تُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولُ يَدۡعُوكُمۡ لِتُؤۡمِنُواْ بِرَبِّكُمۡ وَقَدۡ أَخَذَ مِيثَٰقَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should [truly] be believers

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖ لِّيُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ
verses.translation: It is He who sends down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful

verses.text: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَا يَسۡتَوِي مِنكُم مَّنۡ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبۡلِ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ وَقَٰتَلَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنفَقُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَقَٰتَلُواْۚ وَكُلّٗا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
verses.translation: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest [of Makkah] and fought [and those who did so after it]. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best [reward]. And Allah, with what you do, is Acquainted

verses.text: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يُقۡرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا فَيُضَٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ
verses.translation: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تَرَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ يَسۡعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۖ بُشۡرَىٰكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتُ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱنظُرُونَا نَقۡتَبِسۡ مِن نُّورِكُمۡ قِيلَ ٱرۡجِعُواْ وَرَآءَكُمۡ فَٱلۡتَمِسُواْ نُورٗاۖ فَضُرِبَ بَيۡنَهُم بِسُورٖ لَّهُۥ بَابُۢ بَاطِنُهُۥ فِيهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَةُ وَظَٰهِرُهُۥ مِن قِبَلِهِ ٱلۡعَذَابُ
verses.translation: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment

verses.text: يُنَادُونَهُمۡ أَلَمۡ نَكُن مَّعَكُمۡۖ قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ وَلَٰكِنَّكُمۡ فَتَنتُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَتَرَبَّصۡتُمۡ وَٱرۡتَبۡتُمۡ وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡأَمَانِيُّ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ
verses.translation: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah

verses.text: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡيَةٞ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِيَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination

verses.text: ۞أَلَمۡ يَأۡنِ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَن تَخۡشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمۡ لِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَطَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَدُ فَقَسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient

verses.text: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ قَدۡ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُصَّدِّقَٰتِ وَأَقۡرَضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّيقُونَۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَآءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ وَنُورُهُمۡۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire

verses.text: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞ وَزِينَةٞ وَتَفَاخُرُۢ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَتَكَاثُرٞ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَوۡلَٰدِۖ كَمَثَلِ غَيۡثٍ أَعۡجَبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا ثُمَّ يَكُونُ حُطَٰمٗاۖ وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَغۡفِرَةٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٞۚ وَمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ إِلَّا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡغُرُورِ
verses.translation: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion

verses.text: سَابِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا كَعَرۡضِ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty

verses.text: مَآ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِيبَةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِيٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن نَّبۡرَأَهَآۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ
verses.translation: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy

verses.text: لِّكَيۡلَا تَأۡسَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَفۡرَحُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالٖ فَخُورٍ
verses.translation: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبۡخَلُونَ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبُخۡلِۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ
verses.translation: [Those] who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy

verses.text: لَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَأَنزَلۡنَا ٱلۡحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأۡسٞ شَدِيدٞ وَمَنَٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ
verses.translation: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحٗا وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ فَمِنۡهُم مُّهۡتَدٖۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ
verses.translation: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient

verses.text: ثُمَّ قَفَّيۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيۡنَا بِعِيسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡيَمَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلَۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأۡفَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَرَهۡبَانِيَّةً ٱبۡتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبۡنَٰهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ رِضۡوَٰنِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوۡهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَاۖ فَـَٔاتَيۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡرَهُمۡۖ وَكَثِيرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَٰسِقُونَ
verses.translation: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَءَامِنُواْ بِرَسُولِهِۦ يُؤۡتِكُمۡ كِفۡلَيۡنِ مِن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ نُورٗا تَمۡشُونَ بِهِۦ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

verses.text: لِّئَلَّا يَعۡلَمَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَلَّا يَقۡدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ مِّن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡفَضۡلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allah and that [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty

verses.text: قَدۡ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّتِي تُجَٰدِلُكَ فِي زَوۡجِهَا وَتَشۡتَكِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ يَسۡمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَآۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُظَٰهِرُونَ مِنكُم مِّن نِّسَآئِهِم مَّا هُنَّ أُمَّهَٰتِهِمۡۖ إِنۡ أُمَّهَٰتُهُمۡ إِلَّا ٱلَّـٰٓـِٔي وَلَدۡنَهُمۡۚ وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَيَقُولُونَ مُنكَرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَزُورٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٞ
verses.translation: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُظَٰهِرُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمۡ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا قَالُواْ فَتَحۡرِيرُ رَقَبَةٖ مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن يَتَمَآسَّاۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ تُوعَظُونَ بِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
verses.translation: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do

verses.text: فَمَن لَّمۡ يَجِدۡ فَصِيَامُ شَهۡرَيۡنِ مُتَتَابِعَيۡنِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَتَمَآسَّاۖ فَمَن لَّمۡ يَسۡتَطِعۡ فَإِطۡعَامُ سِتِّينَ مِسۡكِينٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِتُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۚ وَتِلۡكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِۗ وَلِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ كُبِتُواْ كَمَا كُبِتَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ وَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۚ وَلِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعٗا فَيُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوٓاْۚ أَحۡصَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ وَنَسُوهُۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness

verses.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ مَا يَكُونُ مِن نَّجۡوَىٰ ثَلَٰثَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ رَابِعُهُمۡ وَلَا خَمۡسَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ سَادِسُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَدۡنَىٰ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكۡثَرَ إِلَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كَانُواْۖ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُواْ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing

verses.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نُهُواْ عَنِ ٱلنَّجۡوَىٰ ثُمَّ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا نُهُواْ عَنۡهُ وَيَتَنَٰجَوۡنَ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَٰنِ وَمَعۡصِيَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِۖ وَإِذَا جَآءُوكَ حَيَّوۡكَ بِمَا لَمۡ يُحَيِّكَ بِهِ ٱللَّهُ وَيَقُولُونَ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ لَوۡلَا يُعَذِّبُنَا ٱللَّهُ بِمَا نَقُولُۚ حَسۡبُهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ يَصۡلَوۡنَهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا تَنَٰجَيۡتُمۡ فَلَا تَتَنَٰجَوۡاْ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَٰنِ وَمَعۡصِيَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِ وَتَنَٰجَوۡاْ بِٱلۡبِرِّ وَٱلتَّقۡوَىٰۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, when you converse privately, do not converse about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger but converse about righteousness and piety. And fear Allah, to whom you will be gathered

verses.text: إِنَّمَا ٱلنَّجۡوَىٰ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ لِيَحۡزُنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَلَيۡسَ بِضَآرِّهِمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Private conversation is only from Satan that he may grieve those who have believed, but he will not harm them at all except by permission of Allah. And upon Allah let the believers rely

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمۡ تَفَسَّحُواْ فِي ٱلۡمَجَٰلِسِ فَٱفۡسَحُواْ يَفۡسَحِ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَإِذَا قِيلَ ٱنشُزُواْ فَٱنشُزُواْ يَرۡفَعِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡعِلۡمَ دَرَجَٰتٖۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, when you are told, "Space yourselves" in assemblies, then make space; Allah will make space for you. And when you are told, "Arise," then arise; Allah will raise those who have believed among you and those who were given knowledge, by degrees. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا نَٰجَيۡتُمُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدِّمُواْ بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ نَجۡوَىٰكُمۡ صَدَقَةٗۚ ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ وَأَطۡهَرُۚ فَإِن لَّمۡ تَجِدُواْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, when you [wish to] privately consult the Messenger, present before your consultation a charity. That is better for you and purer. But if you find not [the means] - then indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

verses.text: ءَأَشۡفَقۡتُمۡ أَن تُقَدِّمُواْ بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ نَجۡوَىٰكُمۡ صَدَقَٰتٖۚ فَإِذۡ لَمۡ تَفۡعَلُواْ وَتَابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Have you feared to present before your consultation charities? Then when you do not and Allah has forgiven you, then [at least] establish prayer and give zakah and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is Acquainted with what you do

verses.text: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوۡاْ قَوۡمًا غَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا هُم مِّنكُمۡ وَلَا مِنۡهُمۡ وَيَحۡلِفُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَذِبِ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Have you not considered those who make allies of a people with whom Allah has become angry? They are neither of you nor of them, and they swear to untruth while they know [they are lying]

verses.text: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing

verses.text: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ
verses.translation: They took their [false] oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah, and for them is a humiliating punishment

verses.text: لَّن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
verses.translation: Never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. Those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعٗا فَيَحۡلِفُونَ لَهُۥ كَمَا يَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٍۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰذِبُونَ
verses.translation: On the Day Allah will resurrect them all, and they will swear to Him as they swear to you and think that they are [standing] on something. Unquestionably, it is they who are the liars

verses.text: ٱسۡتَحۡوَذَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ ذِكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ حِزۡبُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ
verses.translation: Satan has overcome them and made them forget the remembrance of Allah. Those are the party of Satan. Unquestionably, the party of Satan - they will be the losers

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡأَذَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, the ones who oppose Allah and His Messenger - those will be among the most humbled

verses.text: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ
verses.translation: Allah has written, "I will surely overcome, I and My messengers." Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might

verses.text: لَّا تَجِدُ قَوۡمٗا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ يُوَآدُّونَ مَنۡ حَآدَّ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَوۡ كَانُوٓاْ ءَابَآءَهُمۡ أَوۡ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡ أَوۡ إِخۡوَٰنَهُمۡ أَوۡ عَشِيرَتَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ كَتَبَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ وَأَيَّدَهُم بِرُوحٖ مِّنۡهُۖ وَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ رَضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ حِزۡبُ ٱللَّهِۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱللَّهِ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
verses.translation: You will not find a people who believe in Allah and the Last Day having affection for those who oppose Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred. Those - He has decreed within their hearts faith and supported them with spirit from Him. And We will admit them to gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Allah is pleased with them, and they are pleased with Him - those are the party of Allah. Unquestionably, the party of Allah - they are the successful

verses.text: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

verses.text: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ لِأَوَّلِ ٱلۡحَشۡرِۚ مَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْۖ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مَّانِعَتُهُمۡ حُصُونُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَمۡ يَحۡتَسِبُواْۖ وَقَذَفَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلرُّعۡبَۚ يُخۡرِبُونَ بُيُوتَهُم بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَيۡدِي ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فَٱعۡتَبِرُواْ يَـٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
verses.translation: It is He who expelled the ones who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture from their homes at the first gathering. You did not think they would leave, and they thought that their fortresses would protect them from Allah; but [the decree of] Allah came upon them from where they had not expected, and He cast terror into their hearts [so] they destroyed their houses by their [own] hands and the hands of the believers. So take warning, O people of vision

verses.text: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.translation: And if not that Allah had decreed for them evacuation, He would have punished them in [this] world, and for them in the Hereafter is the punishment of the Fire

verses.text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ شَآقُّواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥۖ وَمَن يُشَآقِّ ٱللَّهَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
verses.translation: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty

verses.text: مَا قَطَعۡتُم مِّن لِّينَةٍ أَوۡ تَرَكۡتُمُوهَا قَآئِمَةً عَلَىٰٓ أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيُخۡزِيَ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ
verses.translation: Whatever you have cut down of [their] palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient

verses.text: وَمَآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡهُمۡ فَمَآ أَوۡجَفۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ خَيۡلٖ وَلَا رِكَابٖ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
verses.translation: And what Allah restored [of property] to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it [in an expedition] any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent

verses.text: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينِ وَٱبۡنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ كَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةَۢ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡأَغۡنِيَآءِ مِنكُمۡۚ وَمَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَىٰكُمۡ عَنۡهُ فَٱنتَهُواْۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
verses.translation: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and orphans and the [stranded] traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty

verses.text: لِلۡفُقَرَآءِ ٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُخۡرِجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ وَأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ يَبۡتَغُونَ فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٗا وَيَنصُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ
verses.translation: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and [His] approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, [there is also a share]. Those are the truthful

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو ٱلدَّارَ وَٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ يُحِبُّونَ مَنۡ هَاجَرَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِي صُدُورِهِمۡ حَاجَةٗ مِّمَّآ أُوتُواْ وَيُؤۡثِرُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَلَوۡ كَانَ بِهِمۡ خَصَاصَةٞۚ وَمَن يُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِهِۦ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
verses.translation: And [also for] those who were settled in al-Madinah and [adopted] the faith before them. They love those who emigrated to them and find not any want in their breasts of what the emigrants were given but give [them] preference over themselves, even though they are in privation. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَآءُو مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَلِإِخۡوَٰنِنَا ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ فِي قُلُوبِنَا غِلّٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ رَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: And [there is a share for] those who came after them, saying, "Our Lord, forgive us and our brothers who preceded us in faith and put not in our hearts [any] resentment toward those who have believed. Our Lord, indeed You are Kind and Merciful

verses.text: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ نَافَقُواْ يَقُولُونَ لِإِخۡوَٰنِهِمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجۡتُمۡ لَنَخۡرُجَنَّ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمۡ أَحَدًا أَبَدٗا وَإِن قُوتِلۡتُمۡ لَنَنصُرَنَّكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَكَٰذِبُونَ
verses.translation: Have you not considered those who practice hypocrisy, saying to their brothers who have disbelieved among the People of the Scripture, "If you are expelled, we will surely leave with you, and we will not obey, in regard to you, anyone - ever; and if you are fought, we will surely aid you." But Allah testifies that they are liars

verses.text: لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجُواْ لَا يَخۡرُجُونَ مَعَهُمۡ وَلَئِن قُوتِلُواْ لَا يَنصُرُونَهُمۡ وَلَئِن نَّصَرُوهُمۡ لَيُوَلُّنَّ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: If they are expelled, they will not leave with them, and if they are fought, they will not aid them. And [even] if they should aid them, they will surely turn their backs; then [thereafter] they will not be aided

verses.text: لَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَةٗ فِي صُدُورِهِم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ
verses.translation: You [believers] are more fearful within their breasts than Allah. That is because they are a people who do not understand

verses.text: لَا يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ جَمِيعًا إِلَّا فِي قُرٗى مُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوۡ مِن وَرَآءِ جُدُرِۭۚ بَأۡسُهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ شَدِيدٞۚ تَحۡسَبُهُمۡ جَمِيعٗا وَقُلُوبُهُمۡ شَتَّىٰۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَعۡقِلُونَ
verses.translation: They will not fight you all except within fortified cities or from behind walls. Their violence among themselves is severe. You think they are together, but their hearts are diverse. That is because they are a people who do not reason

verses.text: كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ قَرِيبٗاۖ ذَاقُواْ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
verses.translation: [Theirs is] like the example of those shortly before them: they tasted the bad consequence of their affair, and they will have a painful punishment

verses.text: كَمَثَلِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ إِذۡ قَالَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ ٱكۡفُرۡ فَلَمَّا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّنكَ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: [The hypocrites are] like the example of Satan when he says to man, "Disbelieve." But when he disbelieves, he says, "Indeed, I am disassociated from you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds

verses.text: فَكَانَ عَٰقِبَتَهُمَآ أَنَّهُمَا فِي ٱلنَّارِ خَٰلِدَيۡنِ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَـٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.translation: So the outcome for both of them is that they will be in the Fire, abiding eternally therein. And that is the recompense of the wrong-doers

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡتَنظُرۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ لِغَدٖۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: O you who have believed, fear Allah. And let every soul look to what it has put forth for tomorrow - and fear Allah. Indeed, Allah is Acquainted with what you do

verses.text: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ
verses.translation: And be not like those who forgot Allah, so He made them forget themselves. Those are the defiantly disobedient
