verses.translation: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.translation: O you who wraps himself [in clothing]

verses.text: قُمِ ٱلَّيۡلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
verses.translation: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little

verses.text: نِّصۡفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصۡ مِنۡهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

verses.text: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا
verses.translation: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation

verses.text: إِنَّا سَنُلۡقِي عَلَيۡكَ قَوۡلٗا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word

verses.text: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words

verses.text: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحٗا طَوِيلٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation

verses.text: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا
verses.translation: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion

verses.text: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا
verses.translation: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs

verses.text: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرٗا جَمِيلٗا
verses.translation: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance

verses.text: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little

verses.text: إِنَّ لَدَيۡنَآ أَنكَالٗا وَجَحِيمٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire

verses.text: وَطَعَامٗا ذَا غُصَّةٖ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا
verses.translation: And food that chokes and a painful punishment

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ رَسُولٗا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger

verses.text: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا
verses.translation: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure

verses.text: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired

verses.text: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا
verses.translation: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way

verses.text: ۞إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدۡنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَنِصۡفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٞ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحۡصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ فَٱقۡرَءُواْ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرۡضَىٰ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضۡرِبُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَبۡتَغُونَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ فَٱقۡرَءُواْ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنۡهُۚ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقۡرِضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗاۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُواْ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنۡ خَيۡرٖ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيۡرٗا وَأَعۡظَمَ أَجۡرٗاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمُۢ
verses.translation: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O you who covers himself [with a garment]

verses.text: قُمۡ فَأَنذِرۡ
verses.translation: Arise and warn

verses.text: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرۡ
verses.translation: And your Lord glorify

verses.text: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرۡ
verses.translation: And your clothing purify

verses.text: وَٱلرُّجۡزَ فَٱهۡجُرۡ
verses.translation: And uncleanliness avoid

verses.text: وَلَا تَمۡنُن تَسۡتَكۡثِرُ
verses.translation: And do not confer favor to acquire more

verses.text: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصۡبِرۡ
verses.translation: But for your Lord be patient

verses.text: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي ٱلنَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: And when the trumpet is blown

verses.text: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَوۡمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: That Day will be a difficult day

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ غَيۡرُ يَسِيرٖ
verses.translation: For the disbelievers - not easy

verses.text: ذَرۡنِي وَمَنۡ خَلَقۡتُ وَحِيدٗا
verses.translation: Leave Me with the one I created alone

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡتُ لَهُۥ مَالٗا مَّمۡدُودٗا
verses.translation: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

verses.text: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودٗا
verses.translation: And children present [with him]

verses.text: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمۡهِيدٗا
verses.translation: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life]

verses.text: ثُمَّ يَطۡمَعُ أَنۡ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: Then he desires that I should add more

verses.text: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِأٓيَٰتِنَا عَنِيدٗا
verses.translation: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate

verses.text: سَأُرۡهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: I will cover him with arduous torment

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Indeed, he thought and deliberated

verses.text: فَقُتِلَ كَيۡفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated

verses.text: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيۡفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated

verses.text: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: Then he considered [again]

verses.text: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: Then he frowned and scowled

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ
verses.translation: Then he turned back and was arrogant

verses.text: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ
verses.translation: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others]

verses.text: إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوۡلُ ٱلۡبَشَرِ
verses.translation: This is not but the word of a human being

verses.text: سَأُصۡلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: I will drive him into Saqar

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is Saqar

verses.text: لَا تُبۡقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned]

verses.text: لَوَّاحَةٞ لِّلۡبَشَرِ
verses.translation: Blackening the skins

verses.text: عَلَيۡهَا تِسۡعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: Over it are nineteen [angels]

verses.text: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٗۖ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا عِدَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيَسۡتَيۡقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَيَزۡدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنٗا وَلَا يَرۡتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَا يَعۡلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡبَشَرِ
verses.translation: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity

verses.text: كَلَّا وَٱلۡقَمَرِ
verses.translation: No! By the moon

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذۡ أَدۡبَرَ
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it departs

verses.text: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَآ أَسۡفَرَ
verses.translation: And [by] the morning when it brightens

verses.text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحۡدَى ٱلۡكُبَرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]

verses.text: نَذِيرٗا لِّلۡبَشَرِ
verses.translation: As a warning to humanity

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind

verses.text: كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

verses.text: إِلَّآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Except the companions of the right

verses.text: فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
verses.translation: About the criminals

verses.text: مَا سَلَكَكُمۡ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.translation: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar

verses.text: قَالُواْ لَمۡ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed

verses.text: وَلَمۡ نَكُ نُطۡعِمُ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ
verses.translation: Nor did we used to feed the poor

verses.text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلۡخَآئِضِينَ
verses.translation: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it]

verses.text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

verses.text: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلۡيَقِينُ
verses.translation: Until there came to us the certainty

verses.text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمۡ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّـٰفِعِينَ
verses.translation: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلتَّذۡكِرَةِ مُعۡرِضِينَ
verses.translation: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُمۡ حُمُرٞ مُّسۡتَنفِرَةٞ
verses.translation: As if they were alarmed donkeys

verses.text: فَرَّتۡ مِن قَسۡوَرَةِۭ
verses.translation: Fleeing from a lion

verses.text: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ
verses.translation: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about

verses.text: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ
verses.translation: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذۡكِرَةٞ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

verses.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then whoever wills will remember it

verses.text: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ
verses.translation: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness

verses.text: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

verses.text: وَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلنَّفۡسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection]

verses.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجۡمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
verses.translation: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones

verses.text: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips

verses.text: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفۡجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
verses.translation: But man desires to continue in sin

verses.text: يَسۡـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ
verses.translation: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection

verses.text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ
verses.translation: So when vision is dazzled

verses.text: وَخَسَفَ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the moon darkens

verses.text: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the sun and the moon are joined

verses.text: يَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ أَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape

verses.text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: No! There is no refuge

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence

verses.text: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٞ
verses.translation: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness

verses.text: وَلَوۡ أَلۡقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Even if he presents his excuses

verses.text: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
verses.translation: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an

verses.text: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا جَمۡعَهُۥ وَقُرۡءَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation

verses.text: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعۡ قُرۡءَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا بَيَانَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you]

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: No! But you love the immediate

verses.text: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ
verses.translation: And leave the Hereafter

verses.text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٞ
verses.translation: Looking at their Lord

verses.text: وَوُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَاسِرَةٞ
verses.translation: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted

verses.text: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفۡعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٞ
verses.translation: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِيَ
verses.translation: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

verses.text: وَقِيلَ مَنۡۜ رَاقٖ
verses.translation: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]

verses.text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلۡفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation

verses.text: وَٱلۡتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
verses.translation: And the leg is wound about the leg

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession

verses.text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed

verses.text: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: But [instead], he denied and turned away

verses.text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride]

verses.text: أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰ
verses.translation: Woe to you, and woe

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Then woe to you, and woe

verses.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتۡرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: Does man think that he will be left neglected

verses.text: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةٗ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

verses.text: فَجَعَلَ مِنۡهُ ٱلزَّوۡجَيۡنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And made of him two mates, the male and the female

verses.text: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
verses.translation: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead

verses.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا
verses.translation: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned

verses.text: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing

verses.text: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur

verses.text: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
verses.translation: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance]

verses.text: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا
verses.translation: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread

verses.text: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive

verses.text: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude

verses.text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful

verses.text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا
verses.translation: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

verses.text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُواْ جَنَّةٗ وَحَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments]

verses.text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا
verses.translation: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold

verses.text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا
verses.translation: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance

verses.text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.translation: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass]

verses.text: قَوَارِيرَاْ مِن فِضَّةٖ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقۡدِيرٗا
verses.translation: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure

verses.text: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

verses.text: عَيۡنٗا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلۡسَبِيلٗا
verses.translation: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel

verses.text: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٗا مَّنثُورٗا
verses.translation: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion

verses.text: عَٰلِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرٞ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٞۖ وَحُلُّوٓاْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٖ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابٗا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
verses.translation: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated

verses.text: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively

verses.text: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا
verses.translation: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever]

verses.text: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا
verses.translation: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

verses.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night

verses.text: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day

verses.text: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا
verses.translation: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way

verses.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا
verses.translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise

verses.text: يُدۡخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا
verses.translation: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment

verses.text: وَٱلۡمُرۡسَلَٰتِ عُرۡفٗا
verses.translation: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

verses.text: فَٱلۡعَٰصِفَٰتِ عَصۡفٗا
verses.translation: And the winds that blow violently

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٰتِ نَشۡرٗا
verses.translation: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]

verses.text: فَٱلۡفَٰرِقَٰتِ فَرۡقٗا
verses.translation: And those [angels] who bring criterion

verses.text: فَٱلۡمُلۡقِيَٰتِ ذِكۡرًا
verses.translation: And those [angels] who deliver a message

verses.text: عُذۡرًا أَوۡ نُذۡرًا
verses.translation: As justification or warning

verses.text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur

verses.text: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتۡ
verses.translation: So when the stars are obliterated

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the heaven is opened

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ نُسِفَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are blown away

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the messengers' time has come

verses.text: لِأَيِّ يَوۡمٍ أُجِّلَتۡ
verses.translation: For what Day was it postponed

verses.text: لِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
verses.translation: For the Day of Judgement

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نُهۡلِكِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy the former peoples

verses.text: ثُمَّ نُتۡبِعُهُمُ ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We will follow them with the later ones

verses.text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Thus do We deal with the criminals

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَخۡلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ
verses.translation: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained

verses.text: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: And We placed it in a firm lodging

verses.text: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
verses.translation: For a known extent

verses.text: فَقَدَرۡنَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡقَٰدِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth a container

verses.text: أَحۡيَآءٗ وَأَمۡوَٰتٗا
verses.translation: Of the living and the dead

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا
verses.translation: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny

verses.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ
verses.translation: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns

verses.text: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame

verses.text: إِنَّهَا تَرۡمِي بِشَرَرٖ كَٱلۡقَصۡرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٞ صُفۡرٞ
verses.translation: As if they were yellowish [black] camels

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: This is a Day they will not speak

verses.text: وَلَا يُؤۡذَنُ لَهُمۡ فَيَعۡتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِۖ جَمَعۡنَٰكُمۡ وَٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples

verses.text: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡدٞ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَٰلٖ وَعُيُونٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs

verses.text: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And fruits from whatever they desire

verses.text: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.translation: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do

verses.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: كُلُواْ وَتَمَتَّعُواْ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجۡرِمُونَ
verses.translation: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثِۭ بَعۡدَهُۥ يُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe

verses.text: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.translation: About what are they asking one another

verses.text: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: About the great news

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي هُمۡ فِيهِ مُخۡتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: That over which they are in disagreement

verses.text: كَلَّا سَيَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: No! They are going to know

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Then, no! They are going to know

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِهَٰدٗا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth a resting place

verses.text: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَوۡتَادٗا
verses.translation: And the mountains as stakes

verses.text: وَخَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا
verses.translation: And We created you in pairs

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا نَوۡمَكُمۡ سُبَاتٗا
verses.translation: And made your sleep [a means for] rest

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا
verses.translation: And made the night as clothing

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشٗا
verses.translation: And made the day for livelihood

verses.text: وَبَنَيۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعٗا شِدَادٗا
verses.translation: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]

verses.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا سِرَاجٗا وَهَّاجٗا
verses.translation: And made [therein] a burning lamp

verses.text: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُعۡصِرَٰتِ مَآءٗ ثَجَّاجٗا
verses.translation: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water

verses.text: لِّنُخۡرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبّٗا وَنَبَاتٗا
verses.translation: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation

verses.text: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلۡفَافًا
verses.translation: And gardens of entwined growth

verses.text: إِنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا
verses.translation: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes

verses.text: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبٗا
verses.translation: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways

verses.text: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ فَكَانَتۡ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage

verses.text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتۡ مِرۡصَادٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait

verses.text: لِّلطَّـٰغِينَ مَـَٔابٗا
verses.translation: For the transgressors, a place of return

verses.text: لَّـٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحۡقَابٗا
verses.translation: In which they will remain for ages [unending]

verses.text: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink

verses.text: إِلَّا حَمِيمٗا وَغَسَّاقٗا
verses.translation: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence

verses.text: جَزَآءٗ وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: An appropriate recompense

verses.text: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَرۡجُونَ حِسَابٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, they were not expecting an account

verses.text: وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابٗا
verses.translation: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial

verses.text: وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ كِتَٰبٗا
verses.translation: But all things We have enumerated in writing

verses.text: فَذُوقُواْ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمۡ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment

verses.text: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment

verses.text: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعۡنَٰبٗا
verses.translation: Gardens and grapevines

verses.text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتۡرَابٗا
verses.translation: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age

verses.text: وَكَأۡسٗا دِهَاقٗا
verses.translation: And a full cup

verses.text: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّـٰبٗا
verses.translation: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood

verses.text: جَزَآءٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابٗا
verses.translation: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account

verses.text: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا
verses.translation: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا
verses.translation: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct

verses.text: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
verses.translation: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return

verses.text: إِنَّآ أَنذَرۡنَٰكُمۡ عَذَابٗا قَرِيبٗا يَوۡمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَٰبَۢا
verses.translation: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَٰتِ غَرۡقٗا
verses.translation: By those [angels] who extract with violence

verses.text: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَٰتِ نَشۡطٗا
verses.translation: And [by] those who remove with ease

verses.text: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَٰتِ سَبۡحٗا
verses.translation: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming

verses.text: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَٰتِ سَبۡقٗا
verses.translation: And those who race each other in a race

verses.text: فَٱلۡمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمۡرٗا
verses.translation: And those who arrange [each] matter

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation]

verses.text: تَتۡبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: There will follow it the subsequent [one]

verses.text: قُلُوبٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: Hearts, that Day, will tremble

verses.text: أَبۡصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٞ
verses.translation: Their eyes humbled

verses.text: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرۡدُودُونَ فِي ٱلۡحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]

verses.text: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمٗا نَّخِرَةٗ
verses.translation: Even if we should be decayed bones

verses.text: قَالُواْ تِلۡكَ إِذٗا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٞ
verses.translation: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return

verses.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, it will be but one shout

verses.text: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface

verses.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the story of Moses

verses.text: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa

verses.text: ٱذۡهَبۡ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed

verses.text: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself

verses.text: وَأَهۡدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخۡشَىٰ
verses.translation: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]

verses.text: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلۡأٓيَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: And he showed him the greatest sign

verses.text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ يَسۡعَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he turned his back, striving

verses.text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: And he gathered [his people] and called out

verses.text: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
verses.translation: And said, "I am your most exalted lord

verses.text: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰٓ
verses.translation: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression]

verses.text: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah]

verses.text: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا
verses.translation: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it

verses.text: رَفَعَ سَمۡكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it

verses.text: وَأَغۡطَشَ لَيۡلَهَا وَأَخۡرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness

verses.text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: And after that He spread the earth

verses.text: أَخۡرَجَ مِنۡهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرۡعَىٰهَا
verses.translation: He extracted from it its water and its pasture

verses.text: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَرۡسَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And the mountains He set firmly

verses.text: مَتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ
verses.translation: As provision for you and your grazing livestock

verses.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove

verses.text: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلۡجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: So as for he who transgressed

verses.text: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
verses.translation: And preferred the life of the world

verses.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ هِيَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination

verses.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ هِيَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge

verses.text: يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرۡسَىٰهَا
verses.translation: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival

verses.text: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكۡرَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: In what [position] are you that you should mention it

verses.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: To your Lord is its finality

verses.text: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰهَا
verses.translation: You are only a warner for those who fear it

verses.text: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof

verses.text: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: The Prophet frowned and turned away

verses.text: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ
verses.translation: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting]

verses.text: وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified

verses.text: أَوۡ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰٓ
verses.translation: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him

verses.text: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: As for he who thinks himself without need

verses.text: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: To him you give attention

verses.text: وَمَا عَلَيۡكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسۡعَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

verses.text: وَهُوَ يَخۡشَىٰ
verses.translation: While he fears [Allah]

verses.text: فَأَنتَ عَنۡهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: From him you are distracted

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذۡكِرَةٞ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder

verses.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: So whoever wills may remember it

verses.text: فِي صُحُفٖ مُّكَرَّمَةٖ
verses.translation: [It is recorded] in honored sheets

verses.text: مَّرۡفُوعَةٖ مُّطَهَّرَةِۭ
verses.translation: Exalted and purified

verses.text: بِأَيۡدِي سَفَرَةٖ
verses.translation: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels

verses.text: كِرَامِۭ بَرَرَةٖ
verses.translation: Noble and dutiful

verses.text: قُتِلَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكۡفَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he

verses.text: مِنۡ أَيِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
verses.translation: From what substance did He create him

verses.text: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
verses.translation: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him

verses.text: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then He eased the way for him

verses.text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقۡبَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him

verses.text: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقۡضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
verses.translation: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him

verses.text: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
verses.translation: Then let mankind look at his food

verses.text: أَنَّا صَبَبۡنَا ٱلۡمَآءَ صَبّٗا
verses.translation: How We poured down water in torrents

verses.text: ثُمَّ شَقَقۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ شَقّٗا
verses.translation: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts]

verses.text: فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا حَبّٗا
verses.translation: And caused to grow within it grain

verses.text: وَعِنَبٗا وَقَضۡبٗا
verses.translation: And grapes and herbage

verses.text: وَزَيۡتُونٗا وَنَخۡلٗا
verses.translation: And olive and palm trees

verses.text: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلۡبٗا
verses.translation: And gardens of dense shrubbery

verses.text: وَفَٰكِهَةٗ وَأَبّٗا
verses.translation: And fruit and grass

verses.text: مَّتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ
verses.translation: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock

verses.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
verses.translation: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

verses.text: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: And his mother and his father

verses.text: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: And his wife and his children

verses.text: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ
verses.translation: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him

verses.text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّسۡفِرَةٞ
verses.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright

verses.text: ضَاحِكَةٞ مُّسۡتَبۡشِرَةٞ
verses.translation: Laughing, rejoicing at good news

verses.text: وَوُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَلَيۡهَا غَبَرَةٞ
verses.translation: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust

verses.text: تَرۡهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: Blackness will cover them

verses.text: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَفَرَةُ ٱلۡفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ كُوِّرَتۡ
verses.translation: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the stars fall, dispersing

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are removed

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتۡ
verses.translation: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the wild beasts are gathered

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the seas are filled with flame

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the souls are paired

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡمَوۡءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

verses.text: بِأَيِّ ذَنۢبٖ قُتِلَتۡ
verses.translation: For what sin she was killed

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the pages are made public

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the sky is stripped away

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَنَّةُ أُزۡلِفَتۡ
verses.translation: And when Paradise is brought near

verses.text: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أَحۡضَرَتۡ
verses.translation: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it]

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلۡخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: So I swear by the retreating stars

verses.text: ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: Those that run [their courses] and disappear

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا عَسۡعَسَ
verses.translation: And by the night as it closes in

verses.text: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: And by the dawn when it breathes

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولٖ كَرِيمٖ
verses.translation: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger

verses.text: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ
verses.translation: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position]

verses.text: مُّطَاعٖ ثَمَّ أَمِينٖ
verses.translation: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy

verses.text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجۡنُونٖ
verses.translation: And your companion is not [at all] mad

verses.text: وَلَقَدۡ رَءَاهُ بِٱلۡأُفُقِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
verses.translation: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلۡغَيۡبِ بِضَنِينٖ
verses.translation: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَيۡطَٰنٖ رَّجِيمٖ
verses.translation: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens]

verses.text: فَأَيۡنَ تَذۡهَبُونَ
verses.translation: So where are you going

verses.text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

verses.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَسۡتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: For whoever wills among you to take a right course

verses.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتۡ
verses.translation: When the sky breaks apart

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the stars fall, scattering

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the seas are erupted

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡقُبُورُ بُعۡثِرَتۡ
verses.translation: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered

verses.text: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ وَأَخَّرَتۡ
verses.translation: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you

verses.text: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you

verses.text: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: No! But you deny the Recompense

verses.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
verses.translation: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers

verses.text: كِرَامٗا كَٰتِبِينَ
verses.translation: Noble and recording

verses.text: يَعۡلَمُونَ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
verses.translation: They know whatever you do

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٖ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

verses.text: وَإِنَّ ٱلۡفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٖ
verses.translation: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire

verses.text: يَصۡلَوۡنَهَا يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense

verses.text: وَمَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
verses.translation: And never therefrom will they be absent

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense

verses.text: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense

verses.text: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe to those who give less [than due]

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
verses.translation: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full

verses.text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ يُخۡسِرُونَ
verses.translation: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss

verses.text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

verses.text: لِيَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
verses.translation: For a tremendous Day

verses.text: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
verses.translation: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٞ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is sijjeen

verses.text: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ
verses.translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

verses.text: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: Who deny the Day of Recompense

verses.text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor

verses.text: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples

verses.text: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
verses.translation: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire

verses.text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny

verses.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun

verses.text: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ
verses.translation: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

verses.text: يَشۡهَدُهُ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah]

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On adorned couches, observing

verses.text: تَعۡرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure

verses.text: يُسۡقَوۡنَ مِن رَّحِيقٖ مَّخۡتُومٍ
verses.translation: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed

verses.text: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
verses.translation: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete

verses.text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسۡنِيمٍ
verses.translation: And its mixture is of Tasneem

verses.text: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed

verses.text: وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِهِمۡ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting

verses.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
verses.translation: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost

verses.text: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
verses.translation: But they had not been sent as guardians over them

verses.text: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ
verses.translation: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers

verses.text: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On adorned couches, observing

verses.text: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do

verses.text: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ
verses.translation: When the sky has split [open]

verses.text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
verses.translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

verses.text: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ
verses.translation: And when the earth has been extended

verses.text: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ
verses.translation: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

verses.text: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
verses.translation: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
verses.translation: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
verses.translation: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand

verses.text: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابٗا يَسِيرٗا
verses.translation: He will be judged with an easy account

verses.text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورٗا
verses.translation: And return to his people in happiness

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
verses.translation: But as for he who is given his record behind his back

verses.text: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا
verses.translation: He will cry out for destruction

verses.text: وَيَصۡلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا
verses.translation: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah]

verses.text: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
verses.translation: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing

verses.text: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: So I swear by the twilight glow

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: And [by] the night and what it envelops

verses.text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

verses.text: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٖ
verses.translation: [That] you will surely experience state after state

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.translation: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe

verses.text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
verses.translation: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: But those who have disbelieved deny

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves

verses.text: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So give them tidings of a painful punishment

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
verses.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By the sky containing great stars

verses.text: وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ
verses.translation: And [by] the promised Day

verses.text: وَشَاهِدٖ وَمَشۡهُودٖ
verses.translation: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed

verses.text: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأُخۡدُودِ
verses.translation: Cursed were the companions of the trench

verses.text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ
verses.translation: [Containing] the fire full of fuel

verses.text: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُعُودٞ
verses.translation: When they were sitting near it

verses.text: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ
verses.translation: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses

verses.text: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire

verses.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment

verses.text: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats

verses.text: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate

verses.text: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Honorable Owner of the Throne

verses.text: فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: Effecter of what He intends

verses.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers

verses.text: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud

verses.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبٖ
verses.translation: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial

verses.text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ
verses.translation: While Allah encompasses them from behind

verses.text: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانٞ مَّجِيدٞ
verses.translation: But this is an honored Qur'an

verses.text: فِي لَوۡحٖ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ
verses.translation: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By the sky and the night comer

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is the night comer

verses.text: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: It is the piercing star

verses.text: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ
verses.translation: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector

verses.text: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: So let man observe from what he was created

verses.text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٖ دَافِقٖ
verses.translation: He was created from a fluid, ejected

verses.text: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
verses.translation: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able

verses.text: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
verses.translation: The Day when secrets will be put on trial

verses.text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ
verses.translation: Then man will have no power or any helper

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ
verses.translation: By the sky which returns [rain]

verses.text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ
verses.translation: And [by] the earth which cracks open

verses.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلٞ فَصۡلٞ
verses.translation: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement

verses.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ
verses.translation: And it is not amusement

verses.text: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, they are planning a plan

verses.text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدٗا
verses.translation: But I am planning a plan

verses.text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا
verses.translation: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile

verses.text: سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى
verses.translation: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who created and proportioned

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And who destined and [then] guided

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ
verses.translation: And who brings out the pasture

verses.text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوَىٰ
verses.translation: And [then] makes it black stubble

verses.text: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
verses.translation: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget

verses.text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ
verses.translation: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden

verses.text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: And We will ease you toward ease

verses.text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: So remind, if the reminder should benefit

verses.text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰ
verses.translation: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded

verses.text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
verses.translation: But the wretched one will avoid it

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي يَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire

verses.text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ
verses.translation: Neither dying therein nor living

verses.text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

verses.text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays

verses.text: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا
verses.translation: But you prefer the worldly life

verses.text: وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ
verses.translation: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring

verses.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures

verses.text: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses

verses.text: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡغَٰشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]

verses.text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled

verses.text: عَامِلَةٞ نَّاصِبَةٞ
verses.translation: Working [hard] and exhausted

verses.text: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةٗ
verses.translation: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire

verses.text: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةٖ
verses.translation: They will be given drink from a boiling spring

verses.text: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ
verses.translation: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

verses.text: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ
verses.translation: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger

verses.text: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاعِمَةٞ
verses.translation: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure

verses.text: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةٞ
verses.translation: With their effort [they are] satisfied

verses.text: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ
verses.translation: In an elevated garden

verses.text: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةٗ
verses.translation: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech

verses.text: فِيهَا عَيۡنٞ جَارِيَةٞ
verses.translation: Within it is a flowing spring

verses.text: فِيهَا سُرُرٞ مَّرۡفُوعَةٞ
verses.translation: Within it are couches raised high

verses.text: وَأَكۡوَابٞ مَّوۡضُوعَةٞ
verses.translation: And cups put in place

verses.text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةٞ
verses.translation: And cushions lined up

verses.text: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: And carpets spread around

verses.text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ
verses.translation: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ
verses.translation: And at the sky - how it is raised

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَيۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ
verses.translation: And at the mountains - how they are erected

verses.text: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَيۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ
verses.translation: And at the earth - how it is spread out

verses.text: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٞ
verses.translation: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder

verses.text: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ
verses.translation: You are not over them a controller

verses.text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: However, he who turns away and disbelieves

verses.text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ
verses.translation: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment

verses.text: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ
verses.translation: Indeed, to Us is their return

verses.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: Then indeed, upon Us is their account

verses.text: وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ
verses.translation: By the dawn

verses.text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرٖ
verses.translation: And [by] ten nights

verses.text: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ
verses.translation: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَسۡرِ
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it passes

verses.text: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
verses.translation: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception

verses.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad

verses.text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ
verses.translation: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars

verses.text: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
verses.translation: The likes of whom had never been created in the land

verses.text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ
verses.translation: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley

verses.text: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِي ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
verses.translation: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes

verses.text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ
verses.translation: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

verses.text: فَأَكۡثَرُواْ فِيهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ
verses.translation: And increased therein the corruption

verses.text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment

verses.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ
verses.translation: Indeed, your Lord is in observation

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ
verses.translation: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me

verses.text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
verses.translation: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me

verses.text: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: No! But you do not honor the orphan

verses.text: وَلَا تَحَـٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ
verses.translation: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor

verses.text: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلٗا لَّمّٗا
verses.translation: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether

verses.text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبّٗا جَمّٗا
verses.translation: And you love wealth with immense love

verses.text: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا
verses.translation: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed

verses.text: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفّٗا صَفّٗا
verses.translation: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank

verses.text: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance

verses.text: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.translation: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life

verses.text: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ
verses.translation: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment

verses.text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ
verses.translation: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers]

verses.text: يَـٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul

verses.text: ٱرۡجِعِيٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةٗ مَّرۡضِيَّةٗ
verses.translation: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him]

verses.text: فَٱدۡخُلِي فِي عِبَٰدِي
verses.translation: And enter among My [righteous] servants

verses.text: وَٱدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.translation: And enter My Paradise

verses.text: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
verses.translation: I swear by this city, Makkah

verses.text: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
verses.translation: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city

verses.text: وَوَالِدٖ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him]

verses.text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: We have certainly created man into hardship

verses.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ
verses.translation: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him

verses.text: يَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالٗا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance

verses.text: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Does he think that no one has seen him

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ
verses.translation: Have We not made for him two eyes

verses.text: وَلِسَانٗا وَشَفَتَيۡنِ
verses.translation: And a tongue and two lips

verses.text: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَيۡنِ
verses.translation: And have shown him the two ways

verses.text: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: But he has not broken through the difficult pass

verses.text: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass

verses.text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: It is the freeing of a slave

verses.text: أَوۡ إِطۡعَٰمٞ فِي يَوۡمٖ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةٖ
verses.translation: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

verses.text: يَتِيمٗا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: An orphan of near relationship

verses.text: أَوۡ مِسۡكِينٗا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةٖ
verses.translation: Or a needy person in misery

verses.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ
verses.translation: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion

verses.text: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Those are the companions of the right

verses.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
verses.translation: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left

verses.text: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارٞ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ
verses.translation: Over them will be fire closed in

verses.text: وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: By the sun and its brightness

verses.text: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the moon when it follows it

verses.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the day when it displays it

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it covers it

verses.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

verses.text: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

verses.text: وَنَفۡسٖ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

verses.text: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا
verses.translation: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness

verses.text: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: He has succeeded who purifies it

verses.text: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption]

verses.text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَآ
verses.translation: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression

verses.text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا
verses.translation: When the most wretched of them was sent forth

verses.text: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا
verses.translation: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink

verses.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them]

verses.text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقۡبَٰهَا
verses.translation: And He does not fear the consequence thereof

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night when it covers

verses.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And [by] the day when it appears

verses.text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And [by] He who created the male and female

verses.text: إِنَّ سَعۡيَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, your efforts are diverse

verses.text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: As for he who gives and fears Allah

verses.text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: And believes in the best [reward]

verses.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: We will ease him toward ease

verses.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

verses.text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: And denies the best [reward]

verses.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ
verses.translation: We will ease him toward difficulty

verses.text: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
verses.translation: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls

verses.text: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance

verses.text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life]

verses.text: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارٗا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing

verses.text: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
verses.translation: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who had denied and turned away

verses.text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى
verses.translation: But the righteous one will avoid it

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي يُؤۡتِي مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

verses.text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
verses.translation: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High

verses.text: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضَىٰ
verses.translation: And he is going to be satisfied

verses.text: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By the morning brightness

verses.text: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness

verses.text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you]

verses.text: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life]

verses.text: وَلَسَوۡفَ يُعۡطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰٓ
verses.translation: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied

verses.text: أَلَمۡ يَجِدۡكَ يَتِيمٗا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
verses.translation: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge

verses.text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And He found you lost and guided [you]

verses.text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلٗا فَأَغۡنَىٰ
verses.translation: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient

verses.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ
verses.translation: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him]

verses.text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ
verses.translation: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him]

verses.text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ
verses.translation: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it]

verses.text: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ
verses.translation: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast

verses.text: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ
verses.translation: And We removed from you your burden

verses.text: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ
verses.translation: Which had weighed upon your back

verses.text: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ
verses.translation: And raised high for you your repute

verses.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا
verses.translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease

verses.text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرٗا
verses.translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease

verses.text: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ
verses.translation: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship]

verses.text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب
verses.translation: And to your Lord direct [your] longing

verses.text: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig and the olive

verses.text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: And [by] Mount Sinai

verses.text: وَهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِينِ
verses.translation: And [by] this secure city [Makkah]

verses.text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
verses.translation: We have certainly created man in the best of stature

verses.text: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
verses.translation: Then We return him to the lowest of the low

verses.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ
verses.translation: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted

verses.text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
verses.translation: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense

verses.text: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is not Allah the most just of judges

verses.text: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ
verses.translation: Recite in the name of your Lord who created

verses.text: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: Created man from a clinging substance

verses.text: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ
verses.translation: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous

verses.text: ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ
